subject: Football
Trades (Sports)
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Jets made the most dramatic move of the first round of the N.F.L. draft, giving up three players who were probably going to be spare parts to grab Mark Sanchez.
snippet: The Jets made the most dramatic move of the first round of the N.F.L. draft, giving up three players who were probably going to be spare parts to grab Mark Sanchez.
